column4: can I find out over console which grafic card is actually built into my system even though no driver for it is installed?
is there a command that shows all my hardware?
so wher do i find in lshw my grafic card, where should it be there under which category
is nvidia c51 a grafic card?
is there a way to get the keyring manager to run with firefox
what do you mean by 'run'? Doesn't the keyring manager 'run' every time an application tries to access it?
my firefox doesn't access it, it saves it passwords somewhere else
ahh, I see - you want firefox to store it's passwords in the keyring manager. Nope, it doesn't do that :(
is there an other password application that is compatible with firefox?
Firefox is not designed to 'outsource' is password storage. That would require some hacking.
and can I enter manually passwords into password save?
hmm... I doubt it... if you really want to investigate, #firefox on irc.mozilla.org would know better
It would make sense for it to store it's passes in the keyring manager though :-/
Evolution can do that, can I import mails from Thunderbird to Evolution?
I need an password manager that works together with Firefox - anyone a clue?
I already told you. there is none. wirefox was not designed to outsource it's password storage. If you need further info, go to #firefox on irc.mozilla.org
